text: Siegfried Hug was a cross-country skier from Germany. Hug competed at the 1960 Winter Olympics. He was born on 4 December 1935 and died on 29 November 2020.Siegfried Hug == References == Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German skiers Category:Olympians for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg
title: Siegfried Hug
